name: Dazzling Night
description:
Let's make the flower bloom at night when the moon is seen!
Let's color a gorgeous cherry blossom by dancing according to the rhythm.

The operation is very simple.
It touches the flower that passes over the line according to good timing.

Various kinds of stages are prepared.
A new stage comes out when the stage is cleared.
A lot of people will be able to enjoy it long!

*** It is attention! Please read. ***
This game is only compatible with the iPad series, fourth-generation iPod Touch, and iPhone4.
The games recommend playing with iPad most.
Some of the stage are downloaded from the Internet. Therefore, download when there is no communication environment such as wi-fi is not recommended.
It is possible to enjoy it more comfortably by using the earphone or the headphone.
